title: Florida Man Sues Dunkin’ After An “Exploding” Toilet Traumatized Him (He Was Sitting On It At The Time)
description:
A Florida man found himself in a crappy situation and is now suing Dunkin’ Donuts for the trauma that sounds very traumatizing.

So what happened, you ask? Well, a toilet exploded all over this poor man. Yes, a toilet. I didn’t even know toilets could explode.

— (@)

According to USA Today:

“A Florida man is seeking $50,000 in damages after he said a toilet at a Dunkin' location exploded and covered him in debris, feces and urine.

description:

title: Naked Ski Event Meant For Women Only Will, Of Course, Now Allow “Female Identifying” Men To Participate
description:
There is a naked ski event in Colorado that has typically been marketed towards women but will now allow men who identify as female nonbinary to hit the slopes. It is unclear what the point of this event is but I assume it is in protest of the patriarchy.

— (@)

According to The Daily Mail:

title: Watch: NBC Reporter Panics After She Tries To Throw Race-Baiting Questions At Vivek Ramaswamy
description:
Liberals hate it when people speak facts. They hate it so much that it not only gets them mad. They also tend to have a knee-jerk reaction where they go into a panic that is similar to how a chicken would react when its head is cut off. This is what happened to NBC's Dasha Burns when she tried to throw some race-baiting questions at Vivek Ramaswamy.

It was just a few days ago when Ramaswamy annihilated a WaPo reporter after she asked him to condemn white supremacy. You could not see the reporter but her name is Meryl Kornfield and she has much, much lighter skin than Vivek, who has what liberals call "colored" skin, due to the fact he is from India.

title: "Yellowstone" creator, Joe Rogan BLAST Dem scheme to remove Trump from ballot: "Regardless what you think of Donald Trump"
description:
Joe Rogan finally sat down with Yellowstone creator Taylor Sheridan for over two hours. They covered a lot. There is a fun clip of them sh*ting on vegans floating around. And one area they discussed is the extreme tactics Democrats are using to remove any opponent from the ballot.

Sheridan's comments are what I found interesting, because I rarely hear from people who follow politics but come from, for lack of a better phrase, the "center." title: WaPo reporter LITERALLY does what Vivek Ramaswamy said she would over "white supremacy" answer, gets fact-checked hard
description:
If they weren't so evil and detrimental to our country, you could almost admire journalismers shamelessness and lack of self respect. Vivek Ramaswamy told a Washington Post content creator exactly what she would do as he was making her look stupid... and she did it anyway. It's remarkable.

To recap. Hours after the White House announced he was kicking off his campaign with a Saturday speech claiming everyone who disagrees with him is white supremacist (I'm paraphrasing), a WaPo journalismer asked Vivek to condemn white supremacy twice. Let's focus on this one sentence from Vivek's response.

"I know you're going to go print this headline tomorrow, I know how your game works, 'Vivek Ramaswamy Won't Condemn White Supremacy.'"

She did it anyway.
